cleaned_text: - Phthlate Free - Vegan - Handmade - Net wt. 20 oz Detox Bath Crystals $10.00Price Introducing Dimond Pamper Essentials SLEEP bath crystals, the perfect way to unwind and relax after a long day. Infused with the calming scent of lavender, our SLEEP bath crystals will transport you to a state of tranquility, helping you to drift off into a peaceful sleep. Lavender has been used for centuries for its relaxing properties, helping to reduce stress and anxiety, and promote restful sleep. Our bath crystals are crafted with the finest ingredients, ensuring a luxurious and soothing experience. Immerse yourself in a warm bath, and let our SLEEP bath crystals transform your bath time routine into a serene and indulgent experience. Try it today and experience the magic of lavender for yourself.
